description: Customer perception of how fast the order was delivered compared to promised or expected timelines.
Extent to which the delivered items match the original order in terms of product, quantity, size, and specifications.
Overall experience with the delivery process, including courier professionalism, coordination, and ease of receipt.
Evaluation of the packaging�s durability, cleanliness, and ability to protect the product during transit.
Whether the product arrived undamaged, intact, and in acceptable physical condition.
Customer assessment of the product�s materials, workmanship, and overall quality after receiving and using it.
Customer confidence that the product is genuine and not counterfeit or misrepresented.
How accurately the online product description, images, and specifications reflect the delivered item.
Perceived fairness of the price relative to the product�s quality, features, and overall value.
Trustworthiness of the seller based on fulfillment accuracy, honesty, and consistency.
Effectiveness and clarity of communication from the seller regarding the order and delivery.
Availability and accuracy of shipment tracking information and delivery status updates.
How simple and convenient it is for customers to initiate and complete a product return.
Timeliness of refund processing after a return or cancellation request.
Customer experience with replacing an incorrect, defective, or unwanted product.
Speed and availability of customer support when addressing post-delivery issues.
Ability of customer support to resolve issues satisfactorily and provide clear solutions.
Overall success in resolving delivery, product, or service-related problems.
Customer perception of shipping fees and whether delivery costs are reasonable.
Whether all ordered items, accessories, or components were included in the delivery.
Overall trust in the marketplace platform to ensure fair transactions and reliable sellers.
Customer willingness to purchase again from the same seller or marketplace.
Likelihood that the customer would recommend the seller or marketplace to others.
Feedback that does not clearly fall into any specific category
Feedback that contains any other topic
